Scripting practice 1

Learning objectives

  • To write a complete installable Python program

1. Setup a new repo

  1. Clone the repo to your ~/hacks directory.
  2. – Go and complete tutorial 9.1 before returning to the next steps –
  3. Open the ~/hacks/hello-script directory in your coding editor by using cd to move into that directory and then calling either subl . or code . to start sublimetext3 or vscode (depending on which one you installed).
